scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p='node_modules/node-mymazda/tsconfig.json'; const j=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8')); j.compilerOptions=j.compilerOptions||{}; j.compilerOptions.useUnknownInCatchVariables=false; fs.writeFileSync(p, JSON.stringify(j,null,2));" && npm --prefix node_modules/node-mymazda install --include=dev && npm --prefix node_modules/node-mymazda run build
